DOC.brief_summary: In study , regress proliferative diabetic retinopathy , severe , severe moderate non-prolifrative diabetic retinopathy patient go cataract surgery , underwent complete eye examination , OCT , FAG color photography 2 week prior operation . All patient divide two : 1 ) control group ( Phyco , PCIOL ) , 2 ) triamcinolone treatment group ( Phaco PCIOL+IVT ) . One month surgery complete eye examination do especially ; IOP endophthalmitis . A 6 month follow-up do two group diabetic retinopathy progression check .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Intravitral Injection Triamcinolone Combined With Cataract Surgery ( Phacoemulsification ) Diabetic Macular Edema Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: Diabetic patient nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy regress PDR Uncontrolled HTN History glaucoma Active PDR NVI TRD Any ophthalmic operation Renal problem ( cr > 3 ) CVA Uveitis
